targets.query:
from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_peers" or r._field == "gather_peers")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step" or r._measurement == "validator_window")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gather_success_rate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "tokens_per_sec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_window")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss_own_before" or r._field == "loss_own_after" or r._field == "loss_random_before" or r._field == "loss_random_after")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_window")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss_own_improvement" or r._field == "loss_random_improvement")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "templar_metrics_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "weight")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_window")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gather_time" or r._field == "evaluation_time" or r._field == "model_update_time" or r._field == "peer_update_time")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "mean_grad_norm" or r._field == "max_grad_norm" or r._field == "min_grad_norm")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "learning_rate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "data_loading_time" or r._field == "training_time" or r._field == "compression_time" or r._field == "gather_time" or r._field == "model_update_time")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "batch_tokens" or r._field == "total_tokens" or r._field == "effective_batch_size")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "benchmark_task")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "score")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "benchmark_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "benchmark_runtime_s")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "similarity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg_peer_similarity" or r._field == "max_peer_similarity" or r._field == "min_peer_similarity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "gradient_analysis")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gradient_norm" or r._field == "index_reuse_ratio" or r._field == "unique_indices_count" or r._field == "total_indices_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sys_cpu_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sys_mem_used" or r._field == "sys_mem_total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gpu_mem_allocated_mb" or r._field == "gpu_mem_cached_mb" or r._field == "gpu_mem_total_mb")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gpu_mem_segments")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "mean")
